findings.title: Environment Variables Used
findings.description: Application correctly uses environment variables for configuration
findings.recommendation: Continue using environment variables for sensitive configuration

findings.title: No Encryption Implementation Found
findings.description: Sensitive data may be stored without encryption
findings.recommendation: Implement encryption for sensitive data storage using Node.js crypto module

findings.title: World-Readable Data Directory
findings.description: Data directory is readable by other users

findings.title: WebSocket Usage Detected
findings.description: WebSocket connections should use WSS and validate origins
findings.recommendation: Use WSS instead of WS and implement origin validation

findings.title: WebSocket Usage Detected
findings.description: WebSocket connections should use WSS and validate origins
findings.recommendation: Use WSS instead of WS and implement origin validation

findings.title: Unsafe JSON Parsing
findings.description: JSON.parse used without proper error handling

findings.title: Unsafe JSON Parsing
findings.description: JSON.parse used without proper error handling

findings.title: Unsafe JSON Parsing
findings.description: JSON.parse used without proper error handling

findings.title: Direct File Path Usage
findings.description: File paths used without apparent validation against traversal attacks
findings.recommendation: Validate and sanitize file paths, use path.resolve() and check against allowed directories

findings.title: SQL-like Operations Detected
findings.description: Code contains SQL-like operations that should be parameterized
findings.recommendation: Use parameterized queries for any database operations

findings.title: SQL-like Operations Detected
findings.description: Code contains SQL-like operations that should be parameterized
findings.recommendation: Use parameterized queries for any database operations

findings.title: SQL-like Operations Detected
findings.description: Code contains SQL-like operations that should be parameterized
findings.recommendation: Use parameterized queries for any database operations

findings.title: SQL-like Operations Detected
findings.description: Code contains SQL-like operations that should be parameterized
findings.recommendation: Use parameterized queries for any database operations

findings.title: Weak Session ID Generation
findings.description: Session IDs may not be generated with sufficient randomness
findings.recommendation: Use crypto.randomUUID() or crypto.randomBytes() for session ID generation

findings.title: No Session Expiration Logic
findings.description: No apparent session expiration or cleanup mechanism
findings.recommendation: Implement session timeout and cleanup mechanisms

findings.title: Weak Session ID Generation
findings.description: Session IDs may not be generated with sufficient randomness
findings.recommendation: Use crypto.randomUUID() or crypto.randomBytes() for session ID generation

findings.title: Unencrypted Session Data
findings.description: Session data may be stored without encryption
findings.recommendation: Encrypt sensitive session data before storage

findings.title: No Session Expiration Logic
findings.description: No apparent session expiration or cleanup mechanism
findings.recommendation: Implement session timeout and cleanup mechanisms

findings.title: Permissive CORS Policy
findings.description: CORS allows requests from any origin
findings.recommendation: Restrict CORS to specific trusted origins

vulnerabilities.title: No Encryption Implementation Found
vulnerabilities.description: Sensitive data may be stored without encryption
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Implement encryption for sensitive data storage using Node.js crypto module

vulnerabilities.title: Weak Session ID Generation
vulnerabilities.description: Session IDs may not be generated with sufficient randomness
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Use crypto.randomUUID() or crypto.randomBytes() for session ID generation

vulnerabilities.title: Weak Session ID Generation
vulnerabilities.description: Session IDs may not be generated with sufficient randomness
vulnerabilities.recommendation: Use crypto.randomUUID() or crypto.randomBytes() for session ID generation

recommendations.recommendation: Implement encryption for sensitive data storage and transmission.
Improve session management with proper ID generation, encryption, and expiration.

shortTerm.action: Implement encryption for sensitive data storage using Node.js crypto module
Use crypto.randomUUID() or crypto.randomBytes() for session ID generation
Use crypto.randomUUID() or crypto.randomBytes() for session ID generation
